citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:29 to 4:00 pm on
12 January 2024. Inspector phoned and left message at 3:29 pm. No one visible outdoors on property. Waited at gate
until 4:00 pm without a call back or appearance of licensee. Licensee did return call at 6:16 pm.
End Section

narrative:

until 4:00 pm without a call back or appearance of licensee. Licensee did return call at 6:16 pm. 
 
 
End Section
